data: The soft twilight of the tropics, that loves to linger over the low latitudes, after the departure of the long summer’s day, was breathing in zephyrs of aromatic sweetness over the shores and plains of the beautiful Queen of the Antilles.

THE soft twilight of the tropics, that loves to linger over the low latitudes, after the departure of the long summer's day, was breathing in zephyrs of aromatic sweetness over the shores and plains of the beautiful Queen of the Antilles.

THE soft twilight of the tropics, that loves to linger over the low latitudes, after the departure of the long summer’s day, was breathing in zephyrs of aromatic sweetness over the shores and plains of the beautiful Queen of the Antilles.
The Heart's Secret; Or, the Fortunes of a Soldier: a Story of Love and the Low Latitudes.
